content: You have been granted access to the {{itemName}} document

comment.text: This translation key is used for the subject line of an email invitation to share a document. It appears in a scenario where a user is granted access to a document and can be used as the subject of the email sent to them.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You have been granted access' is not accurately conveyed by 'لقد تم منحك حق الوصول إلى'. A more natural and accurate translation would be something like 'تم منحك صلاحية الوصول إلى' or 'لقد أُعطيتك صلاحية الوصول إلى'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تم منحك صلاحية الوصول إلى المستند {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Sizə {{itemName}} sənədinə giriş icazəsi verildi " could be improved for natural flow. The preposition 'nə' after 'sənədinin' feels slightly awkward. It would sound more natural to omit it or rephrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sizə {{itemName}} sənədi ilə giriş icazəsi verildi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'giriş icazəsi verildi' is a bit verbose. A more concise phrasing would enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sizə {{itemName}} sənədinə daxil olmaq icazəsi verildi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Даден Ви е достъп до документ {{itemName}}' doesn't fully capture the original meaning of "You have been granted access to the {{itemName}} document." A more accurate translation would convey the act of granting access, not just the existence of access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предоставен Ви е достъп до документ {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ihnen wurde Zugriff auf das Dokument {{itemName}} erteilt' is a bit formal and could be improved for a more user-friendly tone. While grammatically correct, it doesn't convey the same friendly feel as the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie haben Zugriff auf das Dokument {{itemName}} erhalten.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'autorisé' implies permission granted by someone else. 'Granted access' implies access has been provided. A better translation would convey that the user now has access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous avez reçu l'accès au document {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ձեզ տրվել է մատչում դեպի {{itemName}} փաստաթուղթ:' is not an accurate translation of 'You have been granted access to the {{itemName}} document'. 'Մատչում դեպի' doesn't convey 'access to'. A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of 'Ձեզ տրվել է հասանելիություն դեպի {{itemName}} փաստաթուղթ:' or 'Ձեզ շնորհվել է մուտք դեպի {{itemName}} փաստաթուղթ:'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձեզ տրվել է հասանելիություն դեպի {{itemName}} փաստաթուղթ:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ti è stato concesso l'accesso al documento: {{itemName}}' is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Italian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Hai accesso al documento: {{itemName}}' or 'Ti è stato dato accesso al documento: {{itemName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hai accesso al documento: {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'あなたは{{itemName}}ドキュメントへのアクセスを許可されています。' is overly formal and passive. A more natural and direct translation would be better. '許可されています' implies an action taken *for* the recipient rather than a direct grant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: あなたは{{itemName}}ドキュメントにアクセスできるようになりました。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrasing 'You have been granted access' is a bit indirect. The suggested correction aims for a more conversational and active tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: あなたは{{itemName}}ドキュメントにアクセスできるようになりました。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ທ່ານໄດ້ຮັບອະນຸຍາດເຂົ້າເຖິງເອກະສານ {{itemName}}' is a literal translation and could be improved for natural flow in Lao. A more natural phrasing might be 'ທ່ານໄດ້ຮັບການເຂົ້າເຖິງເອກະສານ {{itemName}}' or 'ທ່ານສາມາດເຂົ້າເຖິງເອກະສານ {{itemName}} ໄດ້'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານສາມາດເຂົ້າເຖິງເອກະສານ {{itemName}} ໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Udzielono Ci dostępu do dokumentu {{itemName}}' is a literal translation but sounds somewhat formal and impersonal. A more natural and user-friendly Polish phrasing would be 'Masz dostęp do dokumentu {{itemName}}' or 'Otrzymałeś dostęp do dokumentu {{itemName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Masz dostęp do dokumentu {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Você obteve acesso ao documento {{itemName}}.' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'You have been granted access'. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Você foi autorizado a acessar o documento {{itemName}}.' or 'Você tem permissão para acessar o documento {{itemName}}.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você foi autorizado a acessar o documento {{itemName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "V-a fost acordat accesul la document {{itemName}}" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "You have been granted access to the {{itemName}} document." A more natural phrasing would be something like "Ați primit acces la documentul {{itemName}}" or "Aveți acces la documentul {{itemName}}".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ați primit acces la documentul {{itemName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඔබට' (obata) is grammatically correct but could be more natural as 'ඔබේ' (obae) in this context. It implies 'to you' versus 'your'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ {{itemName}} ලේඛනයට ප්‍රවේශය ලබා දී ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation 'Omogočen vam je dostop do {{itemName}} dokumenta' is not the most natural or common way to express 'You have been granted access'. A more idiomatic translation would be 'Imate dostop do {{itemName}} dokumenta' or 'Dostop do {{itemName}} dokumenta je omogočen.'. The current translation implies that access *is* enabled, rather than you *having* access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Imate dostop do {{itemName}} dokumenta

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Добили сте приступ {{itemName}} документу' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English sentence. A more natural Serbian translation would use a different phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Добили сте дозволу за приступ {{itemName}} документу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dobili ste pristup {{itemName}} dokumentu' is a reasonable translation, but could be more natural. A more idiomatic Serbian translation might be 'Imate pristup {{itemName}} dokumentu' or 'Omogućeno vam je da pristupite {{itemName}} dokumentu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Imate pristup {{itemName}} dokumentu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'dokümanına' is a less common and slightly archaic spelling of 'dokümanı'. The more common and preferred spelling is 'dokümanı'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: dokümanı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "访问权限" (access permission) sounds somewhat formal and less natural in this context. A more common and user-friendly phrasing would be "查看权限" (view permission) or simply "访问" (access).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 您已获得{{itemName}}文档的查看权限
